faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1: How to download TikTok videos without watermark in 2026?
faq.a1: It's very simple: 1. Open the TikTok app and find the video. 2. Tap 'Share' and select 'Copy Link'. 3. Paste the link in the box above and hit 'Download'. Your video will be saved without the logo.
faq.a2: Yes, SaveTikFast is 100% free and always will be. We do not ask for subscriptions, sign-ups, or any hidden fees to download your favorite content.
faq.q3: Does it work on iPhone (iOS) and Android?
faq.a3: Absolutely! Our tool is optimized for all devices. Whether you are using an iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone, or a PC/Mac, SaveTikFast works perfectly in your browser.
faq.q4: Can I download TikTok videos in 4K/HD quality?
faq.a4: Yes, our advanced algorithm automatically searches for the highest resolution available (HD, Full HD, or 4K) directly from the source server and provides it to you.
faq.q5: Can I save just the music/sound (TikTok to MP3)?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer a dedicated 'Download Audio (MP3)' feature. Just paste the video link, and you will see an option to extract and save the audio file in high quality.
faq.q6: Where are the videos stored on my device?
faq.a6: Files are usually saved in the default 'Downloads' folder of your browser. On mobile devices, you can also find them in your 'Files' app or Gallery, depending on your settings.
faq.q7: Does SaveTikFast store my downloaded videos?
faq.a7: Never. We respect your privacy. We do not host any videos on our servers, and we do not keep copies of your downloaded history. All downloads come directly from TikTok's CDN.
faq.q8: Why does the download link sometimes fail?
faq.a8: Please ensure the TikTok account you are trying to download from is 'Public', not 'Private'. Also, double-check that you have copied the correct video link.
faq.q9: Do I need to install an app or extension?
faq.a9: No installation is required. SaveTikFast is a web-based tool. You only need a web browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, etc.) and an internet connection.
faq.q10: Is it legal to use this downloader?
faq.a10: Yes, as long as you use the downloaded content for personal, non-commercial purposes (like offline viewing). Please respect the copyright of the content creators.

about.title: About Us
about.content:
Welcome to SaveTikFast, the leading TikTok Downloader for 2026.

We built SaveTikFast with one goal in mind: to provide the fastest, safest, and most reliable way to save TikTok videos without watermarks. Unlike other tools, we prioritize user experienceโno annoying pop-ups, no registration, and no software installation required.

Our technology ensures you get the pristine quality of the original video (up to 4K) while stripping away the overlay logos. We are committed to keeping this service free and accessible to everyone worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
We value your feedback and are here to help.

If you encounter any technical issues, have suggestions for improvement, or have business inquiries, please reach out to our support team:

๐ง Email: support@savetik-fast.xyz

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
By using SaveTikFast, you agree to the following terms:

1. Personal Use Only:
Our service is intended for personal, non-commercial use. You may download videos for offline viewing and archiving purposes.

2. Intellectual Property:
We do not own the content downloaded via our tool. All rights belong to the original creators on TikTok. You agree not to use the content in any way that infringes on copyright laws.

3. Liability:
SaveTikFast is not responsible for how you use the downloaded material. The user bears full responsibility for any copyright infringement or misuse.

4. Changes:
We reserve the right to modify or discontinue services at any time.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Your privacy is critical to us.

Data Collection:
We do not collect personal information like names, emails, or phone numbers. We may use anonymous analytics (like cookies) to improve site performance and user experience.

No Video Storage:
SaveTikFast does not host or store any videos on its servers. All file processing is done instantly, and no history of your downloads is maintained.

Security:
Our website uses SSL encryption to ensure a secure connection while you browse and download.

dmca.title: DMCA Policy
dmca.content:
SaveTikFast respects the intellectual property rights of others.

We operate as a technical service provider and do not host copyrighted content. All videos are served directly from third-party servers (TikTok).

If you believe that your copyrighted work has been displayed on our service without authorization, please send a formal DMCA notice to:

Email: support@savetik-fast.xyz

Please include the URL of the infringing content and proof of ownership. We will take immediate action to remove access to the content in question.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
1. Non-Affiliation:
SaveTikFast is an independent utility tool and is NOT affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with TikTok Inc., ByteDance Ltd., or any of their subsidiaries.

2. Trademarks:
The names 'TikTok' and its logos are registered trademarks of their respective owners. We use them solely for identification and descriptive purposes.

3. Content Responsibility:
We do not have control over the content hosted on TikTok servers and assume no liability for the videos downloaded by users.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

faqs.answer: Niemals. Wir respektieren deine Privatsphรคre. Wir hosten keine Videos auf unseren Servern und speichern keinen Verlauf deiner Downloads. Alles ist anonym.

faqs.answer: Bitte stelle sicher, dass das TikTok-Konto, von dem du herunterladen mรถchtest, 'รffentlich' und nicht 'Privat' ist. รberprรผfe auch, ob du den richtigen Link kopiert hast.

faqs.answer: Keine Installation erforderlich. SaveTikFast ist ein webbasiertes Tool. Du benรถtigst nur einen Webbrowser (Chrome, Safari, etc.) und eine Internetverbindung.

faqs.answer: Ja, solange du die heruntergeladenen Inhalte fรผr persรถnliche, nicht-kommerzielle Zwecke nutzt (z. B. Offline-Ansicht). Bitte respektiere das Urheberrecht der Ersteller.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

faq.q1: How to download TikTok videos without watermark in 2026?

faq.a2: Yes, SaveTikFast is 100% free and always will be. We do not ask for subscriptions, sign-ups, or any hidden fees to download your favorite content.

faq.a3: Absolutely! Our tool is optimized for all devices. Whether you are using an iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone, or a PC/Mac, SaveTikFast works perfectly in your browser.
faq.q4: Can I download TikTok videos in 4K/HD quality?
faq.a4: Yes, our advanced algorithm automatically searches for the highest resolution available (HD, Full HD, or 4K) directly from the source server and provides it to you.

faq.a5: Yes, we offer a dedicated 'Download Audio (MP3)' feature. Just paste the video link, and you will see an option to extract and save the audio file in high quality.
faq.q6: Where are the videos stored on my device?
faq.a6: Files are usually saved in the default 'Downloads' folder of your browser. On mobile devices, you can also find them in your 'Files' app or Gallery, depending on your settings.
faq.q7: Does SaveTikFast store my downloaded videos?
faq.a7: Never. We respect your privacy. We do not host any videos on our servers, and we do not keep copies of your downloaded history. All downloads come directly from TikTok's CDN.
faq.q8: Why does the download link sometimes fail?
faq.a8: Please ensure the TikTok account you are trying to download from is 'Public', not 'Private'. Also, double-check that you have copied the correct video link.
faq.q9: Do I need to install an app or extension?
faq.a9: No installation is required. SaveTikFast is a web-based tool. You only need a web browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, etc.) and an internet connection.
faq.q10: Is it legal to use this downloader?
faq.a10: Yes, as long as you use the downloaded content for personal, non-commercial purposes (like offline viewing). Please respect the copyright of the content creators.

faqs.question: Comment tรฉlรฉcharger une vidรฉo TikTok sans filigrane en 2026 ?

faq.title: Aksar Puche Jane Wale Sawal (FAQ)
faq.q1: 2026 mein bina watermark ke TikTok video kaise download karein?
faq.a1: Ye bahut aasaan hai: 1. TikTok app kholein aur video chunein. 2. 'Share' par tap karein aur 'Copy Link' chunein. 3. Upar diye gaye box mein link paste karein aur 'Download' par click karein. Video bina logo ke save ho jayega.
faq.q2: Kya SaveTikFast poori tarah se free hai?
faq.a2: Haan, SaveTikFast 100% free hai aur hamesha rahega. Hum aapke pasandida content ko download karne ke liye koi subscription, registration ya chupa hua shulk nahi lete hain.
faq.q3: Kya ye iPhone (iOS) aur Android par kaam karta hai?
faq.a3: Bilkul! Hamara tool sabhi devices ke liye optimized hai. Chahe aap iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone ya PC/Mac use kar rahe ho, SaveTikFast aapke browser mein perfectly kaam karta hai.
faq.q4: Kya main 4K ya HD quality mein video download kar sakta hoon?
faq.a4: Haan, hamara advanced algorithm automatically source server se sabse high resolution (HD, Full HD ya 4K) dhundta hai aur aapko provide karta hai.
faq.q5: Kya main sirf music/audio (MP3) save kar sakta hoon?
faq.a5: Haan, hum ek special feature 'Download Audio (MP3)' dete hain. Bas video link paste karein, aur aapko high quality audio file extract aur save karne ka option dikhega.
faq.q6: Video mere device mein kahan save hote hain?
faq.a6: Files aamtaur par aapke browser ke default 'Downloads' folder mein save hoti hain. Mobile par, aap unhe File Manager ya Gallery mein bhi dhoond sakte hain.
faq.q7: Kya SaveTikFast mere videos ki copy rakhta hai?
faq.a7: Kabhi nahi. Hum aapki privacy ki izzat karte hain. Hum apne servers par koi video host nahi karte aur na hi aapki download history rakhte hain. Sab kuch anonymous hai.
faq.q8: Download link kabhi-kabhi kaam kyu nahi karta?
faq.a8: Kripya dhyan dein ki jis TikTok account se aap download karne ki koshish kar rahe hain wo 'Public' hona chahiye, 'Private' nahi. Saath hi check karein ki aapne sahi video link copy kiya hai.
faq.q9: Kya mujhe koi app ya extension install karna padega?
faq.a9: Koi installation zaruri nahi hai. SaveTikFast ek web-based tool hai. Aapko bas ek web browser (Chrome, Safari, aadi) aur internet connection ki zarurat hai.
faq.q10: Kya is downloader ka upyog karna legal hai?
faq.a10: Haan, jab tak aap download kiye gaye content ka upyog niji aur gair-vyavsayik (non-commercial) uddeshyon ke liye karte hain (jaise offline dekhna). Kripya creators ke copyright ka samman karein.

about.title: Hmare Bare Mein
about.content:
SaveTikFast mein aapka swagat hai, 2026 ka leading TikTok Downloader.

Humne SaveTikFast ko ek lakshya ke saath banaya hai: TikTok videos ko bina watermark ke save karne ka sabse tez, surakshit aur bharosemand tarika pradan karna. Dusre tools ke vipreet, hum user experience ko prathmikta dete hain: koi pareshan karne wale ads nahi, koi registration nahi aur koi software installation nahi.

Humari technology ye sunishchit karti hai ki aapko video ki original quality (4K tak) mile, wo bhi bina kisi logo ke.

contact.title: Sampark Karein
contact.content:
Hum aapke feedback ki qadar karte hain aur madad ke liye yahan hain.

Agar aapko koi technical dikkat aati hai, sudhaar ke liye sujhav hain, ya business queries hain, toh kripya hamari support team se sampark karein:

๐ง Email: support@savetik-fast.xyz

Hum 24 ghante ke bhitar sabhi sawalon ka jawab dene ki koshish karte hain.

terms.title: Upyog Ki Shartein
terms.content:
SaveTikFast ka upyog karke, aap nimnlikhit sharton se sehmat hote hain:

1. Niji Upyog:
Hamari seva niji aur gair-vyavsayik upyog ke liye hai. Aap offline dekhne ke liye video download kar sakte hain.

2. Bauddhik Sampada (Intellectual Property):
Hum download kiye gaye content ke malik nahi hain. Sabhi adhikar TikTok par original creators ke hain. Aap sehmat hain ki content ka upyog copyright ka ullanghan karne ke liye nahi karenge.

3. Zimmedari:
SaveTikFast iske liye zimmedar nahi hai ki aap download kiye gaye material ka upyog kaise karte hain. User copyright ullanghan ke liye puri tarah zimmedar hai.

privacy.title: Gopniyata Niti
privacy.content:
Aapki privacy hamare liye mahatvapurn hai.

Data Sangrah:
Hum naam ya email jaisi niji jankari ikatha nahi karte. Hum site ki performance behtar banane ke liye anonymous analytics (jaise cookies) ka upyog kar sakte hain.

Video Storage Nahi:
SaveTikFast apne servers par koi video host ya store nahi karta. Sabhi file processing turant hoti hai.

dmca.title: DMCA Policy
dmca.content:
SaveTikFast dusron ke bauddhik sampada adhikaron ka samman karta hai.

Hum ek technical service provider ke roop mein kaam karte hain aur copyright content host nahi karte. Sabhi videos seedhe third-party servers (TikTok) se serve kiye jate hain.

Agar aapko lagta hai ki aapka copyright kiya gaya kaam hamari seva par bina anumati ke dikhaya gaya hai, toh kripya ek formal DMCA notice bhejein: support@savetik-fast.xyz.

disclaimer.title: Asvikaran (Disclaimer)
disclaimer.content:
1. Gair-Sambandhta:
SaveTikFast ek swatantra utility tool hai aur TikTok Inc. ya ByteDance Ltd. se kisi bhi tarah se juda, authorized, endorsed ya officially connected NAHI hai.

2. Trademarks:
'TikTok' naam aur iske logos unke sambandhit malikon ke registered trademarks hain.

3. Content:
TikTok servers par host kiye gaye content par hamara koi niyantran nahi hai.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

faq.title: Pertanyaan Umum (FAQ)
faq.q1: Bagaimana cara download video TikTok tanpa watermark 2026?
faq.a1: Sangat mudah: 1. Buka aplikasi TikTok dan pilih video. 2. Ketuk tombol 'Bagikan' lalu pilih 'Salin Tautan'. 3. Tempel tautan di kotak di atas dan klik 'Unduh'. Video akan tersimpan tanpa logo.
faq.a2: Ya, SaveTikFast sepenuhnya gratis selamanya. Kami tidak meminta biaya langganan, pendaftaran, atau biaya tersembunyi apa pun untuk mengunduh konten favorit Anda.
faq.q3: Apakah bisa di iPhone (iOS) dan Android?
faq.a3: Tentu saja! Alat kami dioptimalkan untuk semua perangkat. Baik Anda menggunakan iPhone, iPad, smartphone Android, atau PC/Laptop, SaveTikFast bekerja sempurna di browser Anda.
faq.q4: Bisakah saya mengunduh video kualitas HD atau 4K?
faq.a4: Ya, algoritma canggih kami secara otomatis mencari resolusi tertinggi yang tersedia (HD, Full HD, atau 4K) langsung dari server sumber dan memberikannya kepada Anda.
faq.q5: Bisakah saya mengunduh lagu/suara TikTok (MP3) saja?
faq.a5: Ya, kami menyediakan fitur khusus 'Download Audio (MP3)'. Cukup tempel tautan video, dan Anda akan melihat opsi untuk mengekstrak dan menyimpan file audio berkualitas tinggi.
faq.q6: Di mana video tersimpan di HP saya?
faq.a6: File biasanya tersimpan di folder 'Unduhan' (Downloads) default browser Anda. Di HP, Anda juga bisa menemukannya di 'File Manager' atau Galeri Foto.
faq.q7: Apakah SaveTikFast menyimpan video yang saya unduh?
faq.a7: Tidak sama sekali. Kami menghargai privasi Anda. Kami tidak menyimpan video di server kami dan tidak melacak riwayat unduhan Anda. Semua proses aman dan anonim.
faq.q8: Mengapa tautan unduhan kadang gagal?

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

faq.title: Soalan Lazim (FAQ)
faq.q1: Bagaimana cara memuat turun video TikTok tanpa tanda air pada tahun 2026?
faq.a1: Sangat mudah: 1. Buka aplikasi TikTok dan pilih video. 2. Tekan 'Kongsi' dan kemudian 'Salin Pautan'. 3. Tampal pautan dalam kotak di atas dan tekan 'Muat Turun'. Video akan disimpan tanpa logo.
faq.a2: Ya, SaveTikFast adalah 100% percuma dan akan sentiasa begitu. Kami tidak meminta langganan, pendaftaran atau caj tersembunyi untuk memuat turun kandungan kegemaran anda.
faq.q3: Adakah ia berfungsi pada iPhone (iOS) dan Android?
faq.a3: Sudah tentu! Alat kami dioptimumkan untuk semua peranti. Sama ada anda menggunakan iPhone, iPad, telefon pintar Android atau PC/Mac, SaveTikFast berfungsi dengan sempurna dalam penyemak imbas anda.
faq.q4: Bolehkah saya memuat turun video dalam kualiti 4K atau HD?
faq.a4: Ya, algoritma canggih kami secara automatik mencari resolusi tertinggi yang tersedia (HD, Full HD atau 4K) terus dari pelayan sumber dan memberikannya kepada anda.
faq.q5: Bolehkah saya menyimpan muzik/audio (MP3) sahaja?
faq.a5: Ya, kami menawarkan ciri khas 'Muat Turun Audio (MP3)'. Hanya tampal pautan video, dan anda akan melihat pilihan untuk mengekstrak dan menyimpan fail audio dalam kualiti tinggi.
faq.q6: Di manakah video disimpan pada peranti saya?
faq.a6: Fail biasanya disimpan dalam folder lalai 'Muat Turun' (Downloads) penyemak imbas anda. Pada telefon bimbit, anda juga boleh mencarinya dalam pengurus fail atau galeri.
faq.q7: Adakah SaveTikFast menyimpan salinan video saya?
faq.a7: Tidak sama sekali. Kami menghormati privasi anda. Kami tidak mengehoskan video di pelayan kami dan tidak menyimpan sejarah muat turun anda. Semuanya adalah tanpa nama.
faq.q8: Mengapa pautan muat turun kadangkala tidak berfungsi?
faq.a8: Sila pastikan akaun TikTok yang anda cuba muat turun adalah 'Awam' dan bukan 'Peribadi'. Juga, semak semula bahawa anda telah menyalin pautan video yang betul.
faq.q9: Adakah saya perlu memasang aplikasi atau sambungan?
faq.a9: Tiada pemasangan diperlukan. SaveTikFast ialah alat berasaskan web. Anda hanya memerlukan penyemak imbas web (Chrome, Safari, dll.) dan sambungan internet.
faq.q10: Adakah sah untuk menggunakan pemuat turun ini?
faq.a10: Ya, selagi anda menggunakan kandungan yang dimuat turun untuk tujuan peribadi dan bukan komersial (seperti tontonan luar talian). Sila hormati hak cipta pencipta.

about.title: Tentang Kami
about.content:
Selamat datang ke SaveTikFast, pemuat turun TikTok terkemuka untuk 2026.

Kami membina SaveTikFast dengan satu matlamat: untuk menyediakan cara terpantas, paling selamat dan paling boleh dipercayai untuk menyimpan video TikTok tanpa tanda air. Tidak seperti alat lain, kami mengutamakan pengalaman pengguna: tiada iklan yang menjengkelkan, tiada pendaftaran dan tiada pemasangan perisian.

Teknologi kami menjamin bahawa anda mendapat kualiti asal video (sehingga 4K) sambil membuang logo yang bertindih.

contact.title: Hubungi Kami
contact.content:
Kami menghargai maklum balas anda dan sedia membantu.

Jika anda menghadapi masalah teknikal, mempunyai cadangan penambahbaikan atau pertanyaan perniagaan, sila hubungi pasukan sokongan kami:

๐ง E-mel: support@savetik-fast.xyz

Kami berusaha untuk membalas semua pertanyaan dalam masa 24 jam.

terms.title: Terma Penggunaan
terms.content:
Dengan menggunakan SaveTikFast, anda bersetuju dengan terma berikut:

1. Penggunaan Peribadi:
Perkhidmatan kami bertujuan untuk penggunaan peribadi dan bukan komersial. Anda boleh memuat turun video untuk tontonan luar talian.

2. Harta Intelek:
Kami tidak memiliki kandungan yang dimuat turun. Semua hak milik pencipta asal di TikTok. Anda bersetuju untuk tidak menggunakan kandungan dengan cara yang melanggar hak cipta.

3. Liabiliti:
SaveTikFast tidak bertanggungjawab ke atas cara anda menggunakan bahan yang dimuat turun. Pengguna memikul tanggungjawab sepenuhnya atas sebarang pelanggaran hak cipta.

privacy.title: Dasar Privasi
privacy.content:
Privasi anda adalah kritikal bagi kami.

Pengumpulan Data:
Kami tidak mengumpul maklumat peribadi seperti nama atau e-mel. Kami mungkin menggunakan analitik tanpa nama (seperti kuki) untuk meningkatkan prestasi laman web.

Tiada Penyimpanan Video:
SaveTikFast tidak mengehos atau menyimpan sebarang video pada pelayannya. Semua pemprosesan fail dilakukan serta-merta.

dmca.title: Dasar DMCA
dmca.content:
SaveTikFast menghormati hak harta intelek orang lain.

Kami beroperasi sebagai penyedia perkhidmatan teknikal dan tidak mengehoskan kandungan berhak cipta. Semua video disajikan terus dari pelayan pihak ketiga (TikTok).

Jika anda percaya bahawa karya berhak cipta anda telah dipaparkan pada perkhidmatan kami tanpa kebenaran, sila hantar notis DMCA rasmi ke: support@savetik-fast.xyz.

disclaimer.title: Penafian
disclaimer.content:
1. Tiada Gabungan:
SaveTikFast ialah alat utiliti bebas dan TIDAK bergabung, dikaitkan, diberi kuasa, disokong oleh, atau dalam apa jua cara disambungkan secara rasmi dengan TikTok Inc. atau ByteDance Ltd.

2. Tanda Dagangan:
Nama 'TikTok' dan logonya adalah tanda dagangan berdaftar pemilik masing-masing.

3. Kandungan:
Kami tidak mempunyai kawalan ke atas kandungan yang dihoskan pada pelayan TikTok.

seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

about.content:
เธขเธดเธเธเธตเธเนเธญเธเธฃเธฑเธเธชเธนเน SaveTikFast เธเธนเนเธเธณเธเนเธฒเธเธเธฒเธฃเธเธฒเธงเธเนเนเธซเธฅเธ TikTok เธชเธณเธซเธฃเธฑเธเธเธต 2026

เนเธฃเธฒเธชเธฃเนเธฒเธ SaveTikFast เธเนเธงเธขเนเธเนเธฒเธซเธกเธฒเธขเนเธเธตเธขเธง: เนเธเธทเนเธญเธกเธญเธเธงเธดเธเธตเธเธตเนเนเธฃเนเธงเธเธตเนเธชเธธเธ เธเธฅเธญเธเธเธฑเธขเธเธตเนเธชเธธเธ เนเธฅเธฐเนเธเธทเนเธญเธเธทเธญเนเธเนเธเธตเนเธชเธธเธเนเธเธเธฒเธฃเธเธฑเธเธเธถเธเธงเธดเธเธตเนเธญ TikTok เนเธเธขเนเธกเนเธกเธตเธฅเธฒเธขเธเนเธณ เนเธเธเธเนเธฒเธเธเธฒเธเนเธเธฃเธทเนเธญเธเธกเธทเธญเธญเธทเนเธเน เนเธฃเธฒเนเธซเนเธเธงเธฒเธกเธชเธณเธเธฑเธเธเธฑเธเธเธฃเธฐเธชเธเธเธฒเธฃเธเนเธเธญเธเธเธนเนเนเธเน: เนเธกเนเธกเธตเนเธเธฉเธเธฒเธเธตเนเธเนเธฒเธฃเธณเธเธฒเธ เนเธกเนเธเนเธญเธเธฅเธเธเธฐเนเธเธตเธขเธ เนเธฅเธฐเนเธกเนเธเนเธญเธเธเธดเธเธเธฑเนเธเธเธญเธเธเนเนเธงเธฃเน

เนเธเธเนเธเนเธฅเธขเธตเธเธญเธเนเธฃเธฒเธฃเธฑเธเธเธฃเธฐเธเธฑเธเธงเนเธฒเธเธธเธเธเธฐเนเธเนเธฃเธฑเธเธเธธเธเธเธฒเธเธงเธดเธเธตเนเธญเธเนเธเธเธเธฑเธ (เธชเธนเธเธชเธธเธ 4K) เนเธเธเธเธฐเธเธตเนเธฅเธเนเธฅเนเธเนเธเธตเนเธเนเธญเธเธเธฑเธเธญเธญเธเนเธ

เนเธกเธทเนเธญเนเธเน SaveTikFast เธเธธเธเธเธเธฅเธเธเธฒเธกเนเธเธทเนเธญเธเนเธเธเนเธญเนเธเธเธตเน:

1. เธเธฒเธฃเนเธเนเธเธฒเธเธชเนเธงเธเธเธฑเธง:
เธเธฃเธดเธเธฒเธฃเธเธญเธเนเธฃเธฒเธกเธตเนเธงเนเธชเธณเธซเธฃเธฑเธเธเธฒเธฃเนเธเนเธเธฒเธเธชเนเธงเธเธเธฑเธงเนเธฅเธฐเนเธกเนเนเธเนเนเธเธทเนเธญเธเธฒเธฃเธเนเธฒ เธเธธเธเธชเธฒเธกเธฒเธฃเธเธเธฒเธงเธเนเนเธซเธฅเธเธงเธดเธเธตเนเธญเนเธเธทเนเธญเธเธนเนเธเธเธญเธญเธเนเธฅเธเนเนเธเน

2. เธเธฃเธฑเธเธขเนเธชเธดเธเธเธฒเธเธเธฑเธเธเธฒ:
เนเธฃเธฒเนเธกเนเนเธเนเนเธเนเธเนเธเนเธฒเธเธญเธเนเธเธทเนเธญเธซเธฒเธเธตเนเธเธฒเธงเธเนเนเธซเธฅเธ เธชเธดเธเธเธดเนเธเธฑเนเธเธซเธกเธเนเธเนเธเธเธญเธเธเธนเนเธชเธฃเนเธฒเธเธเนเธเธเธเธฑเธเธเธ TikTok เธเธธเธเธเธเธฅเธเธเธตเนเธเธฐเนเธกเนเนเธเนเนเธเธทเนเธญเธซเธฒเนเธเธฅเธฑเธเธฉเธเธฐเธเธตเนเธฅเธฐเนเธกเธดเธเธฅเธดเธเธชเธดเธเธเธดเน

3. เธเธงเธฒเธกเธฃเธฑเธเธเธดเธ:
SaveTikFast เนเธกเนเธฃเธฑเธเธเธดเธเธเธญเธเธเนเธญเธงเธดเธเธตเธเธฒเธฃเธเธตเนเธเธธเธเนเธเนเนเธเธทเนเธญเธซเธฒเธเธตเนเธเธฒเธงเธเนเนเธซเธฅเธ เธเธนเนเนเธเนเธเนเธญเธเธฃเธฑเธเธเธดเธเธเธญเธเธเนเธญเธเธฒเธฃเธฅเธฐเนเธกเธดเธเธฅเธดเธเธชเธดเธเธเธดเนเนเธเน เธเธฑเนเธเธชเธดเนเธ

เธเธงเธฒเธกเนเธเนเธเธชเนเธงเธเธเธฑเธงเธเธญเธเธเธธเธเธกเธตเธเธงเธฒเธกเธชเธณเธเธฑเธเธชเธนเธเธชเธธเธเธชเธณเธซเธฃเธฑเธเนเธฃเธฒ

เธเธฒเธฃเธฃเธงเธเธฃเธงเธกเธเนเธญเธกเธนเธฅ:
เนเธฃเธฒเนเธกเนเธฃเธงเธเธฃเธงเธกเธเนเธญเธกเธนเธฅเธชเนเธงเธเธเธธเธเธเธฅ เนเธเนเธ เธเธทเนเธญเธซเธฃเธทเธญเธญเธตเนเธกเธฅ เนเธฃเธฒเธญเธฒเธเนเธเนเธเธฒเธฃเธงเธดเนเธเธฃเธฒเธฐเธซเนเนเธเธเนเธกเนเธฃเธฐเธเธธเธเธฑเธงเธเธ (เนเธเนเธ เธเธธเธเธเธตเน) เนเธเธทเนเธญเธเธฃเธฑเธเธเธฃเธธเธเธเธฃเธฐเธชเธดเธเธเธดเธเธฒเธเธเธญเธเนเธงเนเธเนเธเธเน

เนเธฃเธฒเธเธณเนเธเธดเธเธเธฒเธฃเนเธเธเธฒเธเธฐเธเธนเนเนเธซเนเธเธฃเธดเธเธฒเธฃเธเนเธฒเธเนเธเธเธเธดเธเนเธฅเธฐเนเธกเนเนเธฎเธชเธเนเนเธเธทเนเธญเธซเธฒเธเธตเนเธกเธตเธฅเธดเธเธชเธดเธเธเธดเน เธงเธดเธเธตเนเธญเธเธฑเนเธเธซเธกเธเนเธซเนเธเธฃเธดเธเธฒเธฃเนเธเธขเธเธฃเธเธเธฒเธเนเธเธดเธฃเนเธเนเธงเธญเธฃเนเธเธญเธเธเธธเธเธเธฅเธเธตเนเธชเธฒเธก (TikTok)

เธซเธฒเธเธเธธเธเนเธเธทเนเธญเธงเนเธฒเธเธฒเธเธเธตเนเธกเธตเธฅเธดเธเธชเธดเธเธเธดเนเธเธญเธเธเธธเธเธเธนเธเนเธชเธเธเธเธเธเธฃเธดเธเธฒเธฃเธเธญเธเนเธฃเธฒเนเธเธขเนเธกเนเนเธเนเธฃเธฑเธเธญเธเธธเธเธฒเธ เนเธเธฃเธเธชเนเธเนเธเนเธเนเธเธทเธญเธ DMCA เธญเธขเนเธฒเธเนเธเนเธเธเธฒเธเธเธฒเธฃเนเธเธเธตเน: support@savetik-fast.xyz

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

Data Collection:
We do not collect personal information like names, emails, or phone numbers. We may use anonymous analytics (like cookies) to improve site performance and user experience.

No Video Storage:
SaveTikFast does not host or store any videos on its servers. All file processing is done instantly, and no history of your downloads is maintained.

dmca.title: DMCA Policy

SaveTikFast respects the intellectual property rights of others.

We operate as a technical service provider and do not host copyrighted content. All videos are served directly from third-party servers (TikTok).

If you believe that your copyrighted work has been displayed on our service without authorization, please send a formal DMCA notice to:

Email: support@savetik-fast.xyz

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

faq.title: ะงะฐััั ะทะฐะฟะธัะฐะฝะฝั (FAQ)

faq.a1: ะฆะต ะดัะถะต ะฟัะพััะพ: 1. ะัะดะบัะธะนัะต ะดะพะดะฐัะพะบ TikTok ั ะฒะธะฑะตัััั ะฒัะดะตะพ. 2. ะะฐัะธัะฝััั ยซะะพะดัะปะธัะธััยป, ะฐ ะฟะพััะผ ยซะะพะฟััะฒะฐัะธ ะฟะพัะธะปะฐะฝะฝัยป. 3. ะััะฐะฒัะต ะฟะพัะธะปะฐะฝะฝั ั ะฟะพะปะต ะฒะธัะต ั ะฝะฐัะธัะฝััั ยซะะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะธัะธยป. ะัะดะตะพ ะทะฑะตัะตะถะตัััั ะฑะตะท ะปะพะณะพัะธะฟั.
faq.q2: ะงะธ ั SaveTikFast ะฟะพะฒะฝัััั ะฑะตะทะบะพััะพะฒะฝะธะผ?
faq.a2: ะขะฐะบ, SaveTikFast ะฝะฐ 100% ะฑะตะทะบะพััะพะฒะฝะธะน ั ะทะฐะฒะถะดะธ ัะฐะบะธะผ ะฑัะดะต. ะะธ ะฝะต ะฒะธะผะฐะณะฐัะผะพ ะฟัะดะฟะธัะพะบ, ัะตััััะฐััั ะฐะฑะพ ะฟัะธัะพะฒะฐะฝะธั ะฟะปะฐัะตะถัะฒ ะทะฐ ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะตะฝะฝั ะฒะฐัะพะณะพ ัะปัะฑะปะตะฝะพะณะพ ะบะพะฝัะตะฝัั.

faq.a3: ะะฑัะพะปััะฝะพ! ะะฐั ัะฝััััะผะตะฝั ะพะฟัะธะผัะทะพะฒะฐะฝะธะน ะดะปั ะฒััั ะฟัะธัััะพัะฒ. ะะตะทะฐะปะตะถะฝะพ ะฒัะด ัะพะณะพ, ัะธ ะฒะธะบะพัะธััะพะฒัััะต ะฒะธ iPhone, iPad, ัะผะฐัััะพะฝ ะฝะฐ Android ะฐะฑะพ ะะ/Mac, SaveTikFast ััะดะพะฒะพ ะฟัะฐััั ั ะฒะฐัะพะผั ะฑัะฐัะทะตัั.

faq.a6: ะคะฐะนะปะธ ะทะฐะทะฒะธัะฐะน ะทะฑะตััะณะฐััััั ั ะฟะฐะฟัั ยซะะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะตะฝะฝัยป (Downloads) ะฒะฐัะพะณะพ ะฑัะฐัะทะตัะฐ ะทะฐ ะทะฐะผะพะฒััะฒะฐะฝะฝัะผ. ะะฐ ะผะพะฑัะปัะฝะธั ะฟัะธัััะพัั ะฒะธ ัะฐะบะพะถ ะผะพะถะตัะต ะทะฝะฐะนัะธ ัั ั ัะฐะนะปะพะฒะพะผั ะผะตะฝะตะดะถะตัั ะฐะฑะพ ะณะฐะปะตัะตั.

faq.a7: ะัะบะพะปะธ. ะะธ ะฟะพะฒะฐะถะฐัะผะพ ะฒะฐัั ะบะพะฝััะดะตะฝััะนะฝัััั. ะะธ ะฝะต ัะพะทะผััััะผะพ ะฒัะดะตะพ ะฝะฐ ะฝะฐัะธั ัะตัะฒะตัะฐั ั ะฝะต ะทะฑะตััะณะฐัะผะพ ัััะพััั ะฒะฐัะธั ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะตะฝั. ะัะต ะฐะฝะพะฝัะผะฝะพ.
faq.q8: ะงะพะผั ะฟะพัะธะปะฐะฝะฝั ะฝะฐ ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะตะฝะฝั ัะฝะพะดั ะฝะต ะฟัะฐััั?
faq.a8: ะะตัะตะบะพะฝะฐะนัะตัั, ัะพ ะฐะบะฐัะฝั TikTok, ะท ัะบะพะณะพ ะฒะธ ะฝะฐะผะฐะณะฐััะตัั ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะธัะธ, ั ยซะัะฑะปััะฝะธะผยป, ะฐ ะฝะต ยซะัะธะฒะฐัะฝะธะผยป. ะขะฐะบะพะถ ะฟะตัะตะฒัััะต, ัะธ ะฟัะฐะฒะธะปัะฝะพ ะฒะธ ัะบะพะฟััะฒะฐะปะธ ะฟะพัะธะปะฐะฝะฝั ะฝะฐ ะฒัะดะตะพ.

faq.a9: ะััะฐะฝะพะฒะปะตะฝะฝั ะฝะต ะฟะพัััะฑะฝะต. SaveTikFast โ ัะต ะฒะตะฑ-ัะฝััััะผะตะฝั. ะะฐะผ ะฟะพัััะฑะตะฝ ะปะธัะต ะฒะตะฑ-ะฑัะฐัะทะตั (Chrome, Safari ัะพัะพ) ัะฐ ะฟัะดะบะปััะตะฝะฝั ะดะพ ะะฝัะตัะฝะตัั.

about.title: ะัะพ ะฝะฐั
about.content:
ะะฐัะบะฐะฒะพ ะฟัะพัะธะผะพ ะดะพ SaveTikFast, ะฟัะพะฒัะดะฝะพะณะพ ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถัะฒะฐัะฐ TikTok 2026 ัะพะบั.

ะะธ ััะฒะพัะธะปะธ SaveTikFast ะท ะพะดะฝััั ะผะตัะพั: ะฝะฐะดะฐัะธ ะฝะฐะนัะฒะธะดัะธะน, ะฝะฐะนะฑะตะทะฟะตัะฝััะธะน ั ะฝะฐะนะฝะฐะดัะนะฝััะธะน ัะฟะพััะฑ ะทะฑะตััะณะฐัะธ ะฒัะดะตะพ ะท TikTok ะฑะตะท ะฒะพะดัะฝะธั ะทะฝะฐะบัะฒ. ะะฐ ะฒัะดะผัะฝั ะฒัะด ัะฝัะธั ัะฝััััะผะตะฝััะฒ, ะผะธ ััะฐะฒะธะผะพ ะฝะฐ ะฟะตััะต ะผัััะต ะทัััะฝัััั ะบะพัะธัััะฒะฐัะฐ: ะฝััะบะพั ะฝะฐะฒ'ัะทะปะธะฒะพั ัะตะบะปะฐะผะธ, ะฝััะบะพั ัะตััััะฐััั ัะฐ ะฝััะบะพะณะพ ะฒััะฐะฝะพะฒะปะตะฝะฝั ะฟัะพะณัะฐะผะฝะพะณะพ ะทะฐะฑะตะทะฟะตัะตะฝะฝั.

ะะฐัะฐ ัะตัะฝะพะปะพะณัั ะณะฐัะฐะฝััั, ัะพ ะฒะธ ะพััะธะผะฐััะต ะพัะธะณัะฝะฐะปัะฝั ัะบัััั ะฒัะดะตะพ (ะดะพ 4K), ะฒะธะดะฐะปะธะฒัะธ ะฟัะธ ััะพะผั ะฝะฐะบะปะฐะดะตะฝั ะปะพะณะพัะธะฟะธ.

terms.title: ะฃะผะพะฒะธ ะฒะธะบะพัะธััะฐะฝะฝั
terms.content:
ะะธะบะพัะธััะพะฒัััะธ SaveTikFast, ะฒะธ ะฟะพะณะพะดะถัััะตัั ะท ะฝะฐัััะฟะฝะธะผะธ ัะผะพะฒะฐะผะธ:

1. ะัะพะฑะธััะต ะฒะธะบะพัะธััะฐะฝะฝั:
ะะฐั ัะตัะฒัั ะฟัะธะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะน ะดะปั ะพัะพะฑะธััะพะณะพ ัะฐ ะฝะตะบะพะผะตัััะนะฝะพะณะพ ะฒะธะบะพัะธััะฐะฝะฝั. ะะธ ะผะพะถะตัะต ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถัะฒะฐัะธ ะฒัะดะตะพ ะดะปั ะฟะตัะตะณะปัะดั ะพัะปะฐะนะฝ.

2. ะะฝัะตะปะตะบััะฐะปัะฝะฐ ะฒะปะฐัะฝัััั:
ะะธ ะฝะต ะฒะพะปะพะดััะผะพ ะทะฐะฒะฐะฝัะฐะถะตะฝะธะผ ะบะพะฝัะตะฝัะพะผ. ะัั ะฟัะฐะฒะฐ ะฝะฐะปะตะถะฐัั ะฟะตัะฒััะฝะธะผ ัะฒะพัััะผ ั TikTok. ะะธ ะฟะพะณะพะดะถัััะตัั ะฝะต ะฒะธะบะพัะธััะพะฒัะฒะฐัะธ ะบะพะฝัะตะฝั ั ัะฟะพััะฑ, ัะพ ะฟะพััััั ะฐะฒัะพัััะบั ะฟัะฐะฒะฐ.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.p2: Benefits of image compression include:
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why convert to WebP?
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.
